No dates available Our app is currently undergoing scheduled maintenance, will be right back in a few hours. Thank you for your patience. Sorry!
We are Under Scheduled
Maintenance ORDER 5 IN THESE 10 - GET 1 FREE Orders must be placed within this 10 day window.
 'Pending' orders will change to 'Ordered' after Midnight. Terms & Conditions Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Order 5 days within the set ten day period shown on your app and receive a free lunch.

Your free lunch will be to the value of your lowest priced order within this set period. Vouchers will be emailed to the address you used to register. To add your voucher, go to the wallet section of your app. Grab
Bag

complete! added to this lunch cost. general_channel_id General Settings Notification Alert! Notifications are disabled from settings. Tap here to enable There are some service notifications which MUST be sent to ensure that your child receives their lunches. 

Please follow the button below to turn on important notifications. You can then edit your general notifications choice above Order removed to your favourite list There are no orders for this day. Would you like to make an order? NO INTERNET CONNECTION Retry Network error. Please check your network. Server error. Please try after sometimes. No product found The order deadline
has passed. Uh Oh, Turn off just for this %s Clear all repeat orders for %ss You are about to turn off all repeat orders for upcoming %ss! Are you sure you want to delete order? ORDER REVIEW Repeat Order Every %s Order for %s %s only only We will continue to deliver lunches each %s until you edit/cancel them* One time order. Please remember to order lunch for next %s. You have passed the midnight deadline to order. For a surcharge of %1$s%% you may add a late order up until %2$s ORDER New Order Create ORDER FROM FAVOURITES Green Orange Transaction failed You have cleared your order. Please wait 5 minutes.
If wallet doesn’t top up
Please try again Cannot place order! Go Back Your lunch is ordered correctly if your day turns ‘green’ Repeat orders will not deduct from you wallet until 12 midnight, 36 hours before lunch is due. Do not show this again close You have cleared your order, your wallet will be automatically refunded Processing Which class No Alert Found Order for each individual day to set them on repeat. Your favourites list is empty for this day! order1 order2 no_order Once you've placed an order, tap on the heart icon to save it here. You are about to remove this order from favourites.
Are you sure? There are some service notifications which MUST be sent to ensure that your child receives their lunches. Please follow the button below to turn on important notifications. You can then edit your general notifications choice above. Oops! Looks like your order is empty. Please select at least one product to continue with your order. No internet
connection! Do you want to exit the app?
We will miss you! Please check your network connection and try again. This order has already been processed. Do you want to remove holiday from this date? No Order Placed for this day, Would you like to place an order? Do you want to mark all %s as holiday? Something went wrong.
Please try again! Please choose an item from %s first before moving on the next step of your order Your order will not process until you top up your account. *Repeat orders will deduct at 12 noon, 48 hours before delivery. What is XP? XP are gained by ordering. Once every 2200 points, you will get surprise merch in your bag! Do you want to turn on all %ss for this month? Student/Teacher Holiday Kitchen/School/Class Holiday Are you sure you want to turn this day off? Are you sure you want to turn on this day? There are no orders for this day. Would you like to place an order? Do you want to turn off all %ss for this month? These lunches will not be processed. We love reading your feedback! Please share your thoughts with us and we’ll get back to you by email as soon as possible. No Lunch Ordered € %s Please note you are clearing orders for all %ss
